name: TaxAct 2021 1040 Tax Return
summary: Learn about .TA1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: TaxAct is a tax preparation program that U.S. residents can use to prepare and file Federal and State tax returns. It is available for Windows, in versions named for each tax year, and as an online application.

TaxAct 2021 users can save their form 1040 data as TA1 files. This allows them to close and reopen TaxAct 2021 and continue working on their taxes. TaxAct 2021 saves TA1 files in the following location by default:
You can also create a backup of your 2021 tax return, which is saved in a separate .BA1 file. To do so, you must:
Save your return as a TA1 file.
Select File → Backup... and save your return as a BA1 file.
NOTE: Previous Windows versions of TaxAct saved users' returns as .TA0, .TA9, .TA8, and so on files.

instructions: You can open TA1 files with TaxAct2021 (Windows). You can also import TA1 files into TaxAct Online, while completing your 2022 and later tax returns.
